name: Cricket Coaching Camp
description: Join our intensive cricket coaching camp and improve your batting and bowling skills. Suitable for all age groups.
detailed_desc: Join our annual cricket tournament and showcase your team's skills. This competitive event is open to all cricket enthusiasts. Compete against other teams, experience thrilling matches, and have a chance to win exciting prizes.

name: Football Tournament
description: Participate in the annual football tournament and showcase your team's talent. Prizes and awards for winners.
detailed_desc: Participate in our football league for an unforgettable sports experience. Sign up as an individual player or with your team. Compete in weekly matches, build camaraderie, and aim for victory to earn fantastic rewards.

name: Tennis Lessons
description: Learn tennis from professional coaches. Beginner to advanced levels. Equipment provided.
detailed_desc: Enhance your tennis skills with our professional coaches at the tennis clinic. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced player, our sessions cater to all levels. Book a session now and start improving your game.

name: Chess Championship
description: Compete in the annual chess championship and test your strategic skills against top players.
detailed_desc: Get ready for the ultimate chess championship! It's a tournament where chess enthusiasts can showcase their strategic thinking and compete for the championship title. Participation is free, so sharpen your skills and join the challenge.

name: Basketball Camp
description: Enroll in our basketball camp and enhance your dribbling, shooting, and teamwork abilities.
detailed_desc: Enroll your child in our basketball camp for a fun and educational experience. Led by experienced coaches, participants will develop basketball skills, teamwork, and sportsmanship. It's a great opportunity to make new friends and have a blast on the court.

name: Badminton Open Challenge
description: Participate in the badminton open challenge. Compete with fellow badminton enthusiasts.
detailed_desc: Grab your partner and join our exciting badminton tournament. Compete as a doubles pair and face off against other skilled teams. There are prizes waiting for the winners, so don't miss out on the action-packed event.
